explanation: [0-0] A man in a white chef's uniform stands in front of a restaurant named "Abdurrahman Küçük", smiling and looking forward. He holds a piece of flatbread in his right hand and a white plate in his left hand. In front of him is a mesh tool with two large pots on it, filled with stew and broth.

[0-10] The male chef places the flatbread on the plate in his left hand with his right hand. The camera moves forward, and the male chef reaches into the broth with his right hand, picks up a piece of meat, and places it on the flatbread. The broth from the meat drips onto the flatbread. Then, with a flick of his right hand, all the meat falls onto the flatbread, leaving only a bone in his right hand.
